item.title: Database Exploration: SQL and MongoDB: Relational and NoSQL Databases
item.description: Outline: Examples of the use of SQL and NoSQL queries with MongoDB to demonstrate some usage on University Courses. Programming Language: SQL, MongoDB, Python Topics: SQL and NoSQL commands with MongoDB You can view different query examples here:[Link to GitHub Repository
